display.title: Cole, the Miner
display.description:
ยง71. Prospection: Mining spawners work 25% faster.
2. Mining Wisdom Buff: Earn 1.5x Mining experience on public islands.
3. Mining Fiesta: Started two Mining Fiesta events, in Early Summer and Early Autumn. Earn 2x drops and extra unique loot. Grants +75 Mining Wisdom during the event.
